name: manabound (Tech Build)
description:
Controls : Z to holster weapon, F rolls you forward, C toggles first and third person camera, E to pick up pumpkins, 2 to cast heal , Enter to type in chat, V to voice chat, WASD to move and Spacebar to jump , Left mouse to attack and right to block.

Hey there, Manabound is a PVP survival  game  that is very early in development. It is mainly using store bought assets at the moment until we can make our own. The game is only a college project which was developed in 4 months, this means it is riddled with bugs, glitches and errors so do not be surprised if you encounter some along your travels!

 For now all you can do in the game is explore the 2 islands which have 3 biomes in total made using the voxel plugin.  

Join and talk to your friends via steam to fight  and explore together. Max player count  is 4 at the moment,  in game voip and chat box also exist if need be.

 Hunger and thirst doesn't kill you as of now because we don't have a fully functioning inventory system yet, but you can pick up and eat pumpkins.  Oh and no , you cannot kill the deer (:
